history.proof: intros is_ring x H. split. - shelve. - shelve.

exceptions.tactic: intros S A Mult Add I O Opp v is_ring x H.

exceptions.exn: In environment S : Set A : S -> Prop Add, Mult : S -> S -> S O, I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat is_ring : ring.is_ring x : S H : A x Unable to unify "O" with "Mult x O".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
In environment S : Set A : S -> Prop Add, Mult : S -> S -> S O, I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat is_ring : ring.is_ring x : S H : A x Unable to unify "O" with "Mult O x".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
S: Set
A: S -> Prop
Mult: S -> S -> S
Add: S -> S -> S
I: S
O: S
Opp: S -> S
v: S -> nat

Goal:
is_ring -> forall x : S, A x -> Mult x O = O /\ Mult O x = O

Premises:
is_ring = commutativity S Add /\ is_group S A Add O Opp /\ intern S A Mult /\ associativity S Mult /\ distributivity S Add Mult : Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments Datatypes.S _%nat_scope
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat] ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v0 : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (vw : VectorDef.t ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v0, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v0 w where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat] ?m : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v0 : VectorDef.t ?A (Datatypes.S ?n), v0 = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v0) ?n (VectorDef.tl v0) where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_comm_cons : forall (v0 : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (a : ?A), VectorDef.cons ?A a (?n + ?m) (VectorDef.append v0 w) = VectorDef.append (VectorDef.cons ?A a ?n v0) w where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat] ?m : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
VectorDef.fold_left : (?B -> ?A -> ?B) -> ?B -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> ?B where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type]
VectorDef.fold_right : (?A -> ?B -> ?B) -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> ?B -> ?B where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type]
VectorSpec.fold_left_right_assoc_eq : (forall (a : ?A) (b c : ?B), ?f (?f a b) c = ?f (?f a c) b) -> forall (n : nat) (v0 : VectorDef.t ?B n) (a : ?A), VectorDef.fold_left ?f a v0 = VectorDef.fold_right (fun (x : ?B) (y : ?A) => ?f y x) v0 a where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?f : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- ?A -> ?B -> ?A]
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p : Fin.t ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p)) = p where ?m : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p q : Fin.t ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q) -> p = q where ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
Fin.L_R : forall n : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n + ?m) where ?m : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
VectorDef.splitat : forall l r : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (l + r) -> VectorDef.t ?A l * VectorDef.t ?A r where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type]
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (Datatypes.S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n v2)) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S ->...-> nat |- Type]
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (Datatypes.S n) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t ?A n), P n (VectorDef.cons ?A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (Datatypes.S n)), P n v where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type]
VectorEq.eqb_eq : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), VectorEq.eqb A A_beq v1 v2 = true < -> v1 = v2
PeanoNat.Nat.eq_sym_iff : forall x y : nat, x = y < -> y = x
PeanoNat.Nat.div_mod : forall x y : nat, y <> 0 -> x = y * PeanoNat.Nat.div x y + PeanoNat.Nat.modulo x y
Byte.of_to_nat : forall x : Byte.byte, Byte.of_nat (Byte.to_nat x) = Some x
BinPos.Pos.compare_spec : forall x y : BinNums.positive, CompareSpec (x = y) (BinPos.Pos.lt x y) (BinPos.Pos.lt y x) (BinPos.Pos.compare x y)
Byte.to_of_nat : forall (x : nat) (y : Byte.byte), Byte.of_nat x = Some y -> Byte.to_nat y = x
Byte.to_of_nat_iff : forall (x : nat) (y : Byte.byte), Byte.of_nat x = Some y < -> Byte.to_nat y = x
PeanoNat.Nat.divmod_spec : forall x y q u : nat, u <= y -> let (q', u') := PeanoNat.Nat.divmod x y q u in x + Datatypes.S y * q + (y - u) = Datatypes.S y * q' + (y - u') /\ u' <= y
PeanoNat.Nat.lt_irrefl : forall x : nat, ~ x < x
List.nth_error_nth : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (x d : A), List.nth_error l n = Some x -> List.nth n l d = x
BinPos.Pos.lt = fun x y : BinNums.positive => BinPos.Pos.compare x y = Lt : BinNums.positive -> BinNums.positive -> Prop Arguments BinPos.Pos.lt (_ _)%positive_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.min_max_antimonotone : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le (Basics.flip le)) f -> forall x y : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.min (f x) (f y) = f (PeanoNat.Nat.max x y)
PeanoNat.Nat.divide = fun x y : nat => exists z : nat, y = z * x : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments PeanoNat.Nat.divide (_ _)%nat_scope
BinPosDef.Pos.to_nat = fun x : BinNums.positive => BinPosDef.Pos.iter_op Nat.add x 1 : BinNums.positive -> nat Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.to_nat _%positive_scope : simpl never
PeanoNat.Nat.max_mono : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le le) f -> forall x y : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.max (f x) (f y) = f (PeanoNat.Nat.max x y)
PeanoNat.Nat.log2_wd = fun (x x' : nat) (Hx : x = x') => let o : x <= 0 \/ 0 < x := PeanoNat.Nat.le_gt_cases x 0 in match o with | or_introl H => (fun lemma : PeanoNat.Nat.log2 x = 0 => Morphisms.trans_co_eq_inv_impl_morphism RelationClasses.Equivalence_Transitive (PeanoNat.Nat.log2 x) 0 lemma (PeanoNat.Nat.log2 x') (PeanoNat.Nat.log2 x') (Morphisms.eq_proper_proxy (PeanoNat.Nat.log2 x'))) (PeanoNat.Nat.log2_nonpos x H) ((fun lemma : PeanoNat.Nat.log2 x' = 0 => Morphisms.trans_sym_co_inv_impl_morphism (RelationClasses.Equivalence_PER PeanoNat.Nat.eq_equiv) (PeanoNat.Nat.log2 x') 0 lemma) (PeanoNat.Nat.log2_nonpos x' ((fun lemma : x = x' => Morphisms.subrelation...
PeanoNat.Nat.min_max_antimono : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le (Basics.flip le)) f -> forall x y : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.min (f x) (f y) = f (PeanoNat.Nat.max x y)
BinPosDef.Pos.sub = fun x y : BinNums.positive => match BinPosDef.Pos.sub_mask x y with | BinPosDef.Pos.IsPos z => z | _ => BinNums.xH end : BinNums.positive -> BinNums.positive -> BinNums.positive Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.sub (_ _)%positive_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.div_wd_obligation_1 = fun (x y : nat) (H : x = y) (x0 y0 : nat) (H0 : x0 = y0) => eq_ind_r (fun x1 : nat => PeanoNat.Nat.div x x1 = PeanoNat.Nat.div y y0) (eq_ind_r (fun x1 : nat => PeanoNat.Nat.div x1 y0 = PeanoNat.Nat.div y y0) eq_refl H) H0 : Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) PeanoNat.Nat.div PeanoNat.Nat.div
VectorSpec.cons_inj = fun (A : Type) (a1 a2 : A) (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n) (eq0 : VectorDef.cons A a1 n v1 = VectorDef.cons A a2 n v2) => match eq0 in (_ = x) return (VectorDef.caseS (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (Datatypes.S n0)) => VectorDef.t A n0 -> Prop) (fun (a2' : A) (n0 : nat) (v2' v1' : VectorDef.t A n0) => a1 = a2' /\ v1' = v2') x v1) with | eq_refl => conj eq_refl eq_refl end : forall (A : Type) (a1 a2 : A) (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), VectorDef.cons A a1 n v1 = VectorDef.cons A a2 n v2 -> a1 = a2 /\ v1 = v2 Arguments VectorSpec.cons_inj {A}%type_scope {a1...
PeanoNat.Nat.lt_wd_obligation_1 = fun (x y : nat) (H : x = y) (x0 y0 : nat) (H0 : x0 = y0) => eq_ind_r (fun x1 : nat => x < x1 <-> y < y0) (eq_ind_r (fun x1 : nat => x1 < y0 <-> y < y0) (conj (fun H1 : y < y0 => H1) (fun H1 : y < y0 => H1)) H) H0 : Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) lt lt
BinPosDef.Pos.of_succ_nat = fix of_succ_nat (n : nat) : BinNums.positive := match n with | 0 => BinNums.xH | Datatypes.S x => BinPosDef.Pos.succ (of_succ_nat x) end : nat -> BinNums.positive Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.of_succ_nat _%nat_scope
BinPosDef.Pos.mul = fix mul (x y : BinNums.positive) {struct x} : BinNums.positive := match x with | BinNums.xI p => BinPosDef.Pos.add y (BinNums.xO (mul p y)) | BinNums.xO p => BinNums.xO (mul p y) | BinNums.xH => y end : BinNums.positive -> BinNums.positive -> BinNums.positive Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.mul (_ _)%positive_scope
Bool.orb_false_elim : forall b1 b2 : bool, (b1 || b2)%bool = false -> b1 = false /\ b2 = false
PeanoNat.Nat.max_spec : forall n m : nat, n < m /\ PeanoNat.Nat.max n m = m \/ m <= n /\ PeanoNat.Nat.max n m = n
PeanoNat.Nat.eq_mul_1_nonneg : forall n m : nat, 0 <= n -> n * m = 1 -> n = 1 /\ m = 1
PeanoNat.Nat.eq_mul_1_nonneg' : forall n m : nat, 0 <= m -> n * m = 1 -> n = 1 /\ m = 1

```  
intros S A Mult Add I O Opp v is_ring x H.
destruct H as [H_comm [H_group [H_intern [H_assoc H_dist]]]].
intros H_A.
split.
- rewrite H_intern. reflexivity.
- rewrite H_intern, H_dist. rewrite H_intern. reflexivity.
```

original: intros S A Mult Add I O Opp v is_ring x H. destruct H as [H_comm [H_group [H_intern [H_assoc H_dist]]]]. intros H_A. split. - rewrite H_intern. reflexivity. - rewrite H_intern, H_dist. rewrite H_intern. reflexivity.
